text: Theodore Tobias Mappus Jr. (July 20, 1926 â€“ February 11, 2022) was an American politician. Mappus was born in Charleston, South Carolina. He was in the South Carolina House of Representatives from 1987 to 1991 and was a Republican. Mappus died on February 11, 2022 in Charleston at the age of 95. ==References== Category:1926 births Category:2022 deaths Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Businesspeople from Charleston, South Carolina Category:Politicians from Charleston, South Carolina Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Ted Mappus
